subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous battle fought between the Mughals and Rathore Rajputs took place in Jodhpur?
question_hi: मगही और रात्री राज्यों में निम्नलिंग के मुख्य किस घंटे पर निकलीं?
explanation_en: The famous battle fought between the Mughals and Rathore Rajputs took place on Meera Fort.

Explanation_hi: 15या बातचण में हुए गंवी बातचरण

option_hi.option_explanation_en: The Battle of Jodhpur took place between the Rathore Rajputs and Mewar Rajputs.

option_explanation_hi.option_explanation_en: The battle was fought between the Rathore Rajputs and Mewar Rajputs.
The Battle of Jodhpur was fought between the Rathore Rajputs and Mewar Rajputs.
